description: Name of the work-order source table configured for GIS push operations.
Boolean flag controlling whether this source is active for GIS pushes.
Destination URL of the GIS service used when pushing records from this source; likely a REST/feature service endpoint; confirm with SME.
User or system process that created this configuration entry.
Timestamp when this configuration entry was created.
User or system process that last updated this configuration entry.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this configuration entry.
Optional filter expression (e.g., SQL WHERE clause) restricting which source records are pushed to GIS; likely stored as text; confirm with SME.
